title: CoinMagus
author: CoinMagus
content: The repository where I share my tools to contribute to the Puzzle community.https://github.com/geokomplo/PubHunter

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Just a heads-up: It's better to distribute the source code for iceland2k14's tool (whatever it is you posted here) and then make a build script to autogenerate the library files, instead of distributing the libraries themselves that you put here, in case someone needs to port this to a different platform.
